name: Acras Project
description:
Changes since last update

-New Camera!

-New pathfinding

-New Monsters

-New UI

-New QTE's

-More Spells

- Character Pages with Enter

-Dynamic Soundtrack implemented

Currently known "Features"

-Sometimes the red bar makes it LOOK like you have enough for an attack when you don't

-Dialogue selection with cursor is funky

-Sometimes people get turn skips 

-clicking info bubble on tombstone crashes game

To attack you will need to have enough AP (green  bar)

during battle press qte's for more damage
